argo.system_config_generation.system_config_generation.update_existing_configs module¶

Class for updating existing system-ready rule configs using a set of new conditions

class argo.system_config_generation.system_config_generation.update_existing_configs.UpdateExistingConfigs(rule_configs: dict, updated_conditions=None, updated_scores=None, make_inactive=False, modified_by='argo@simility.com')[source]¶

Bases: object

Updates a set of rule configurations with new conditions, new scores, or both. These can be used to update rules in the system using the update_rules_in_simility module.

updated_rule_configs¶

Dictionary of system-ready rule configurations (values) and the rule name (keys).

Type

dict

update() → dict[source]¶

Updates a set of rule configurations with new conditions, new scores, or both. These can be used to update rules in the system using the update_rules_in_simility module.

Returns

Dictionary of system-ready rule JSON configurations

(in Python dictionary format).

Return type

dict
